TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Refers to a person who is infected with the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). HIV is the virus that causes acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS).

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "positivo para el VIH"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Se refiere a una persona infectada por el virus de la inmunodeficiencia humana (VIH). El VIH es el virus que causa el s√≠ndrome de inmunodeficiencia adquirida (SIDA).
